title: RTI-Based Mathematics Learning Model Development for Students with Mild Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational special education knowledge and understanding of mathematics instruction methods
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for practicing elementary school teachers applying the RTI (Response to Intervention) model, emphasizing smartphone-based learning activities in limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Acquiring the ability to design math lessons according to the RTI 3-tier procedure (instruction-reteaching-intensive intervention)
Cultivating the ability to establish personalized learning strategies by analyzing student response data
Developing blended instructional design capabilities through integration of smartphone-based digital materials and face-to-face classes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
